ID.description: The unique identifier of the prepayment.

Contact.description: Information about the contact associated with the prepayment.

LineItems.description: List of line items associated with the prepayment.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount of the prepayment.

Total.description: The total amount of the prepayment including taxes.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time the prepayment was last updated in UTC format.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the prepayment.

Reference.description: Any reference information related to the prepayment.

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit amount from the prepayment.

AppliedAmount.description: The amount applied to the prepayment.

Allocations.description: List of allocations against the prepayment.

Payments.description: List of payments made for the prepayment.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if the prepayment has any attached files.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount included in the prepayment.

DateString.description: The date of the prepayment as a string.
